<script language="javascript">
<!--//

function elFileChange(el)
{
  var filename = $(el).val();
  var i = Math.max(filename.lastIndexOf('/'),filename.lastIndexOf('\\'));
  if ( i > 0) {
    filename = filename.substring(i+1);
  }
  var title = $("#title_<dtml-var lang>");
  if ( title.val().length == 0) {
    title.val(filename);
  }
  var titlealt = $("#titlealt_<dtml-var lang>");
  if ( titlealt.val().length == 0) {
    titlealt.val(filename);
  }
}

$("#file_<dtml-var lang>").change( function() { elFileChange(this); } );

//-->
</script>

<!--// BO getHref2IndexHtml //-->

<dtml-let title="getObjProperty('title',REQUEST)" ref="getObjProperty('attr_ref',REQUEST)" ><dtml-if "ref.startswith('{$') and ref.endswith('}')"> <dtml-let ref_obj="getLinkObj(ref)"> <dtml-if ref_obj> <dtml-return "MISC_ZMS+'internal_link.gif'"> <dtml-else> <dtml-return "MISC_ZMS+'internal_link_broken.gif'"> </dtml-if> </dtml-let> <dtml-elif "ref.startswith('mailto:')"> <dtml-return "MISC_ZMS+'mail_link.gif'"> <dtml-elif "title.lower()=='medline'"> <dtml-return "MISC_ZMS+'pubmed_small.gif'"> <dtml-else> <dtml-return "MISC_ZMS+'external_link.gif'"> </dtml-if> </dtml-let>

# --// BO getTeaserElements //--
request = container.REQUEST teaserElmnts = [] obs = context.breadcrumbs_obj_path(portalMaster=False) obs.reverse() for ob in obs: abort_penetrance = ob.meta_type == 'ZMSLinkElement' or ob.getObjProperty('attr_zmsteasercontainer_abort_penetrance',request) != '' if abort_penetrance: break temp = [] subobs = ob.filteredChildNodes( request, ['ZMSCustom','ZMSTeaserContainer']) for subob in subobs: if subob.meta_id == 'ZMSTeaserContainer': temp.extend( subob.filteredChildNodes( request)) elif subob.getType() == 'ZMSTeaserElement': temp.append( subob) for teaserElmnt in temp: penetrance = teaserElmnt.getObjProperty('attr_penetrance',request) if ( penetrance in [0,'this',''] and context == ob) or \ ( penetrance in [1,'sub_nav'] and context.meta_id in ['ZMS','ZMSFolder']) or \ ( penetrance in [2,'sub_all']): teaserElmnts.insert( 0, teaserElmnt) teaserElmnts.reverse() return teaserElmnts
# --// EO getTeaserElements //--

<dtml-comment>--// BO pageelement_Teaser //--</dtml-comment>
<dtml-call "REQUEST.set('last_borderstyle',_.None)" ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('last_bgcolor_border',_.None)" ><dtml-let teaserElmnts=getTeaserElements ><dtml-if teaserElmnts ><div id="teaser" ><dtml-in teaserElmnts ><dtml-let teaserElmnt=sequence-item teaserCntnr="teaserElmnt.getParentNode()" ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('borderstyle',teaserCntnr.getObjProperty('attr_borderstyle',REQUEST))" ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('bgcolor_border',teaserCntnr.getObjProperty('attr_bgcolor_border',REQUEST))" ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('bgcolor_title',teaserCntnr.getObjProperty('attr_bgcolor_title',REQUEST))" ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('bgcolor_text',teaserCntnr.getObjProperty('attr_bgcolor_text',REQUEST))" ><dtml-if "last_borderstyle != borderstyle or last_bgcolor_border != bgcolor_border or borderstyle==2" ><dtml-if "last_borderstyle is not _.None and last_bgcolor_border is not _.None " ><dtml-if "last_borderstyle != 3" ></div ></dtml-if ></dtml-if ><dtml-if "borderstyle != 3" ><div class="<dtml-var "teaserCntnr.meta_id">"<dtml-if bgcolor_border> style="background-color: <dtml-var "get_colormap().get(bgcolor_border,'black')">;"</dtml-if> ></dtml-if ></dtml-if ><dtml-if "meta_id in ['ZMSLinkElement','ZMSFile','ZMSTeaserElement']" ><dtml-var pageelement_TeaserElement ><dtml-else ><div class="ZMSTeaserElement"<dtml-if bgcolor_text> style="background-color:<dtml-var "get_colormap().get(bgcolor_text,'transparent')">"</dtml-if> ><dtml-var "_['bodyContentZMSCustom_%s'%meta_id]" ></div ></dtml-if ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('last_borderstyle',borderstyle)" ><dtml-call "REQUEST.set('last_bgcolor_border',bgcolor_border)" ></dtml-let ></dtml-in ><dtml-if "last_borderstyle is not _.None and last_bgcolor_border is not _.None " ><dtml-if "last_borderstyle != 3" ></div ></dtml-if ></dtml-if ></div ></dtml-if ></dtml-let>
<dtml-comment>--// EO pageelement_Teaser //--</dtml-comment>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!--//

function onZMSTextareaFormSubmit()
{
  var b = true;
  var txt = '<xml>'+$('#text_<dtml-var lang>').val()+'</xml>';
  try {
    if (window.DOMParser) {
      var parser=new DOMParser();
      var doc=parser.parseFromString(txt,"text/xml");
      if ( doc.childNodes[0].nodeName == 'parsererror') {
        b = confirm('<dtml-var "getZMILangStr('CAPTION_WARNING')">\n'+doc.childNodes[0].childNodes[0].nodeValue+'\n'+'<dtml-var "getZMILangStr('MSG_CHANGE_ANYWAY')">\n');
      }
    } else if (window.ActiveXObject) {
      var xmlDoc=new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM");
      xmlDoc.async="false";
      xmlDoc.loadXML(txt);
      if ( xmlDoc.childNodes.length == 0) {
        b = confirm('<dtml-var "getZMILangStr('CAPTION_WARNING')">\n'+'Invalid (X)HTML!\n'+'<dtml-var "getZMILangStr('MSG_CHANGE_ANYWAY')">\n');
      }
    }
  }
  catch(e) {
    alert(e.message);
  }
  if (!b)
    return b;
  return onFormSubmit('<dtml-var fmName>');
}

$("form[name=<dtml-var fmName>]").submit( onZMSTextareaFormSubmit);

//-->
</script>

<dtml-comment>--// BO bodyContentZMSCustom_ZMSTextarea //--</dtml-comment>
<dtml-let text="getText(REQUEST)" format="getObjProperty('format',REQUEST)" renderedtext="renderText(format,'text',text,REQUEST,id)" ><dtml-return renderedtext ></dtml-let>
<dtml-comment>--// EO bodyContentZMSCustom_ZMSTextarea //--</dtml-comment>
